ops.description: fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:4, type:6, adjust:0});
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][1] = pos.x; Bank[6][3] = pos.y; Bank[6][5] = pos.z; Bank[6][7] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Cloud}
“Do whatever you want…
Is that what you want to hear?”{PAUSE}“Well, I can't let you do it.
We need your help to save
the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“So there it is, {Barret}.
So I guess it'll be
{Barret}, me, and…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Aeris}
“I wonder if Dyne will join us?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Aeris}
“Hey that's {Cloud}'s line!
'…It's too dangerous, I can't
let you get involved…' blah, blah, blah…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Aeris}
“We saw you and hurried here.
{Barret}, just tell us
what's going on.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Aeris}
“But…Dyne's injury was
the same as yours, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Aeris}
“{Barret},
this isn't the end.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // {Aeris}
“That's easier to understand.
It's you, {Barret}.”
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][1] = pos.x; Bank[6][3] = pos.y; Bank[6][5] = pos.z; Bank[6][7] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
“Didn't I tell you not to come here!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
“From then on,
I couldn't use my right arm no more.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Barret}
“…I was depressed for a while.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Barret}
“But then I threw away my artificial arm
and got this gun grafted in.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Barret}
“…Wouldn't bet on it.
I gotta 'pologize to Dyne
before I can rest in peace.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Barret}
“An' that's why I gotta go alone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Barret}
“@#$%! {Tifa},
you oughtta know by now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
“Yeah.
We're already involved in this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“We saw you and hurried here.
So come on {Barret},
just tell us what's going on.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Tifa}
“Yeah, that's right.
He was deceived by the Shinra too.”{PAUSE}“He'll probably join us
to fight against the Shinra.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Tifa}
“Weren't you going to save the Planet?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Tifa}
“…That's all right.
I'm not so different from you.”
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][1] = pos.x; Bank[6][3] = pos.y; Bank[6][5] = pos.z; Bank[6][7] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Red XIII}
“Hmm? Shall I go with you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Red XIII}
“I heard that the murders at the
Battle Arena were done by a man
with a gun-arm…was that you?”
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][1] = pos.x; Bank[6][3] = pos.y; Bank[6][5] = pos.z; Bank[6][7] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Yuffie}
“You all sure are acting pretty heroic,
considerin' we're not
makin' any money on this…”
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][1] = pos.x; Bank[6][3] = pos.y; Bank[6][5] = pos.z; Bank[6][7] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Cait Sith}
“Fortune's good.
Everything is perfect!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Cait Sith}
“Ju…just hold on for a second!
We just want to talk!
You'll understand if you just hear us out!”
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][1] = pos.x; Bank[6][3] = pos.y; Bank[6][5] = pos.z; Bank[6][7] = pos.triangleId; }

ops.raw: d0 e1 fe 91 ff 00 00 f5 fe 51 ff 00 00

dialogStrings: Mayor's Old House

{Cloud}
“{Barret}!”

{Barret}
“Didn't I tell you not to come here!?”

{Cait Sith}
“Ju…just hold on for a second!
We just want to talk!
You'll understand if you just hear us out!”

{Cloud}
“{Barret}!!”

{Barret}
“Didn't want none
of ya to get involved…”

{Aeris}
“Hey that's {Cloud}'s line!
'…It's too dangerous, I can't
let you get involved…' blah, blah, blah…”

{Tifa}
“Yeah.
We're already involved in this.”

{Aeris}
“We saw you and hurried here.
{Barret}, just tell us
what's going on.”

{Tifa}
“We saw you and hurried here.
So come on {Barret},
just tell us what's going on.”

{Barret}
“You guys…”

{Red XIII}
“I heard that the murders at the
Battle Arena were done by a man
with a gun-arm…was that you?”

{Barret}
“There's another…
another man that got a gun
grafted inta one of his arms.
It was four years ago…”

{Barret}
“From then on,
I couldn't use my right arm no more.”

{Barret}
“…I was depressed for a while.”

{Barret}
“But then I threw away my artificial arm
and got this gun grafted in.”

{Barret}
“Got a new right arm to get revenge on
the Shinra, who took everything away…”

{Barret}
“Back then, I heard the doc say
there was another man
who got the same operation as me.”{PAUSE}“But, his was the left arm.”

{Cloud}
“…”

{Aeris}
“But…Dyne's injury was
the same as yours, right?”

{Tifa}
“Yeah, that's right.
He was deceived by the Shinra too.”{PAUSE}“He'll probably join us
to fight against the Shinra.”

{Barret}
“…Wouldn't bet on it.
I gotta 'pologize to Dyne
before I can rest in peace.”

{Barret}
“An' that's why I gotta go alone.”

{Cloud}
“Do whatever you want…
Is that what you want to hear?”{PAUSE}“Well, I can't let you do it.
We need your help to save
the Planet.”

{Aeris}
“{Barret},
this isn't the end.”

{Tifa}
“Weren't you going to save the Planet?”

{Barret}
“@#$%! {Tifa},
you oughtta know by now.”

{Tifa}
“…That's all right.
I'm not so different from you.”

{Aeris}
“That's easier to understand.
It's you, {Barret}.”

{Cloud}
“So there it is, {Barret}.
So I guess it'll be
{Barret}, me, and…”

{Aeris}
“I wonder if Dyne will join us?”

{Tifa}
“Be careful.”

{Red XIII}
“Hmm? Shall I go with you?”

{Cait Sith}
“Fortune's good.
Everything is perfect!”

{Yuffie}
“You all sure are acting pretty heroic,
considerin' we're not
makin' any money on this…”
